title: Sport and dining recommendations at your fingertips
welcomeText: Sign up for free for intelligent lifestyle recommendations tailored to you.
welcomeSmallText: At least one of the following data categories is needed to make recommendations.
page1: Your heartrate can help us figure out when you are exercising and sleeping.
consent1: Yes, I agree that BeFit uses my heartrate information.
page2: Your smartphone and our GSM network allow to track your location.
consent2: Yes, I agree that BeFit uses my location data based on my smartphone.
page3: Your age helps us better interpret the personal health data.
consent3: Yes, I agree that BeFit uses my age.
page4: Your calorie consumption helps us find the right activities for you.
consent4: Yes, I agree that BeFit uses the calories I consume.
